SET(RAPIDXML_MAJOR_VERSION 1)
SET(RAPIDXML_MINOR_VERSION 13)
SET(RAPIDXML_VERSION ${RAPIDXML_MAJOR_VERSION}.${RAPIDXML_MINOR_VERSION})

SET(REL_PATH "External/Downloads/rapidxml-${RAPIDXML_VERSION}.patched.7z")
SET(PACKAGE_FILE_ID "8747b2f3f39470950405c82413b3bc8551f37777")

DOWNLOAD_PACKAGE("rapidxml" ${REL_PATH} ${PACKAGE_FILE_ID})
